page.title: 17A CHILD'S DAY / TEENAGE LIFE
page.content:
After breakfast I went to school. After assembly Mrs.Tuck taught us singing.We went out to play at half past ten then we practised our play, The Turtle Drum.I said two lines and sang.We ate our sandwiches in the class and then I played on the computer.I did my flower arrangement for the Fayre and some divisions.We packed up and went home.{Gavin aged 9
I go to Bourne Grammar School where I am studying 8 subjects for the General Certificate of Education,ordinary level at 16 and advanced level at 18.I play the flute and the piano and like drawing,reading,T.V.,music and experimenting with fashion clothes and make-up.I sometimes go to the local discos with my friends.My ambition is to go to Art College.{Kirsten aged 15
